name: part_004
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】雪花ラミィ 2nd Anniversary Live!!! ＂Fleur＂【 #雪花ラミィ2周年LIVE  】 [2Qaek3gXDgg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Transition between songs with a black screen and title card.

subtitles.original: いつしか空の音がいやになり合って
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, the sound of the sky became unpleasant

subtitles.original: 色の眼がなあと解いている
subtitles.english: And I'm unraveling the eyes of color

subtitles.original: あたしを書いて
subtitles.english: Write me down

subtitles.original: 鏡に映るあたしを書いて
subtitles.english: Write down the "me" reflected in the mirror

subtitles.original: 誰しもが身間違ったフェイク
subtitles.english: Everyone is a mistaken fake

subtitles.original: 如何して 愛なんてものに群がり
subtitles.english: Why do we flock to things like love

subtitles.original: ズレを欲して生きるのだ
subtitles.english: And live while desiring discord?

subtitles.original: 今日も泳いでる 夜の電車が通り去っていく
subtitles.english: Swimming again today, the night train passes by

subtitles.original: 踊り明かせよ
subtitles.english: Dance the night away

subtitles.original: パッパラパッパラパッパパッパ
subtitles.english: Pappara pappara pappa pappa

subtitles.original: ナゾナゾ騙して歌いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's sing while deceiving with riddles

subtitles.original: タッタラタッタラタッタタッタ
subtitles.english: Tattara tattara tatta tatta

subtitles.original: なぜなぜここが痛むのでしょう
subtitles.english: Why does it hurt here?

subtitles.original: Song: Phony / Words, Music, Movie: Tsumiki / Mix: Masutaken
subtitles.english: Song: Phony / Words, Music, Movie: Tsumiki / Mix: Masutaken

subtitles.original: 散々な日々は変わらないわ
subtitles.english: The terrible days don't change

subtitles.original: 絶望の雨はやまないわ
subtitles.english: The rain of despair doesn't stop

subtitles.original: さよならも言えぬまま泣いた フォニイ フォニイ フォニイ
subtitles.english: I cried without being able to say goodbye, phony phony phony

subtitles.original: 嘘に絡まってるただ
subtitles.english: Just entangled in lies

subtitles.original: 簡単なこともわからないわ
subtitles.english: I don't even understand simple things

subtitles.original: あたしって何だっけ それすら夜の手に絆されて
subtitles.english: What was I again? Even that is fettered by the hand of night

subtitles.original: 愛のように
subtitles.english: Just like love

subtitles.original: さよならまたねと呟いた フォニイ フォニイ フォニイ
subtitles.english: I whispered "goodbye, see you again", phony phony phony

subtitles.original: 嘘に絡まってるあたしはフォニイ
subtitles.english: Entangled in lies, I am a phony

subtitles.original: 造花だけが知っている 秘密のフォニイ
subtitles.english: Only the artificial flowers know the secret phony

subtitles.original: Daphne, Ficus, Iris, Maackia, Lythrum, Myrica, Sabia, flos
subtitles.english: Daphne, Ficus, Iris, Maackia, Lythrum, Myrica, Sabia, flos

subtitles.original: flos / 作詞・作曲: R Sound Design
subtitles.english: flos / Lyrics & Composition: R Sound Design

subtitles.original: 拝啓 僕の願いよ
subtitles.english: Dear my wishes

subtitles.original: 未来よ 絶え間ない後悔よ
subtitles.english: To the future, to the incessant regrets

subtitles.original: 体感八度五分の夢は
subtitles.english: The dream of an 8.5 degree body temperature

subtitles.original: やがて散ってしまった
subtitles.english: Has eventually scattered away

subtitles.original: Daphne, Ficus, Iris, Maackia, Lythrum, Myrica, Sabia
subtitles.english: Daphne, Ficus, Iris, Maackia, Lythrum, Myrica, Sabia

subtitles.original: Thymus, Ribes, Abelia, Sedum
subtitles.english: Thymus, Ribes, Abelia, Sedum

subtitles.original: Leivisia, Opuntia, Lychnis
subtitles.english: Leivisia, Opuntia, Lychnis

subtitles.original: 拝啓 君の想いは
subtitles.english: Dear your feelings

subtitles.original: 憂いは 巡る感情論は
subtitles.english: To the grief, to the revolving emotional theories

subtitles.original: 拝啓 八十五分の世界に
subtitles.english: Dear to the 85% world

subtitles.original: 囚われたまま
subtitles.english: Remaining imprisoned

subtitles.original: 骨を刺すひび割れた今日は
subtitles.english: On this cracked day that pierces the bones

subtitles.original: 溢れ出した遺細に
subtitles.english: In the overflowing remnants

subtitles.original: 薪をくべて風に乗せて
subtitles.english: Adding logs to the fire, riding the wind

subtitles.original: 荒んだ空を彩る
subtitles.english: Coloring the desolate sky

subtitles.original: 荒んだ日々を丁寧に
subtitles.english: Carefully tending to the desolate days

subtitles.original: 飾った花はすぐに枯れていく
subtitles.english: The decorated flowers soon wither away

subtitles.original: 淀んだ僕が夢から覚めて
subtitles.english: The stagnant me wakes up from the dream

subtitles.original: 縋った意味も無い無い無い
subtitles.english: There's no meaning in what I clung to, none, none, none

subtitles.original: 君が僕にくれた声も色も
subtitles.english: The voice and color you gave me

subtitles.original: 揺るぎない愛情も
subtitles.english: The unwavering affection too

subtitles.original: 二人きりの空に光った星も
subtitles.english: The star that shone in the sky with just the two of us

subtitles.original: 遠に散ってしまった
subtitles.english: Has long since scattered away

subtitles.original: 難儀の線の黒の塀に
subtitles.english: On the black wall of the difficult line

subtitles.original: 季節は彩を添わせて
subtitles.english: Letting the seasons add color

subtitles.original: 熱を帯びて鈍く沈んで
subtitles.english: Carrying heat, sinking dully

subtitles.original: 擦れた街に零れる
subtitles.english: Spilling into the worn-out town

subtitles.original: 荒んだ日々を丁寧に
subtitles.english: Carefully tending to the desolate days

subtitles.original: 飾った先に花が咲くはず
subtitles.english: A flower should bloom where it was decorated

subtitles.original: 憩な君は夢を見たまま
subtitles.english: The idle you, while still dreaming

subtitles.original: 悟った振りで水を注いだ
subtitles.english: Poured water with a knowing look

subtitles.original: 木漏れ日の中に
subtitles.english: Amidst the sunlight filtering through trees

subtitles.original: 柔らかく咲いた
subtitles.english: Softly bloomed

subtitles.original: 花は雲の上で散る
subtitles.english: The flower scatters above the clouds
